name: Echo One
description:
2D Action Platformer By Sherwin Claridge.

Audio By One Man Symphony, Cosmin Mirza & Freesound.org

Play in Browser >>> https://simmer.io/@Sherwinkc/echoone

You player as Echo One, a runner who must journey into the depths of a dangerous neon world and retrieve and deliver the packages at any cost.

Controls:
Move: LS / A,D
Attack: X / Mouse L
Jump: A / Space
Dash: B / Mouse R
Look: DPAD UP/DOWN / Arrow UP/DOWN
Activate Weapon: R1 / Q
Shoot Weapon: RT / F
Hint: DPAD Right / Arrow Right
